Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Ramsey and Rubin Colwill have been included in Wales’ squad for the start of their UEFA Nations League campaign.
Jesper Daland has earned a call-up for Norway.
Callum Robinson and Callum O’Dowda have been selected by the Republic of Ireland.
Manolis Siopis has been called up to feature for Greece.
Ethan Horvath has been selected in the squad for the United States of America.
Others: This will mark the first international window following the appointment of former Bluebird Craig Bellamy as Wales manager.
The Republic of Ireland are also set to begin their UEFA Nations League campaign this month, competing in the same group as Greece, Finland and England.
Competing in League B Group 2, this month the side will host Finland before taking on the Republic of Ireland away.
The Stars and Stripes will host Canada before welcoming New Zealand, as the City shot-stopper looks to build on his 10 caps for his country.
Nigeria are set to begin their qualification campaign for the Africa Cup of Nations this month, with Jamilu Collins selected in their squad.
This international window will see many young Bluebirds feature for Wales’ age-grade sides.
